special_abilities.name: Keen Sight and Smell.
descriptions: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The owlbear makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

actions.name: Beak.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.
